articles.title: Is it still possible to get fit and run a marathon after you turn 50? Here's how Mr Miyagi did it - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Benjamin Lee, also known as blogger Mr Miyagi, proves that getting fit after 50 is absolutely possible, having trained and ran his first ever half-marathon at 53 years old. Also: Health experts give their tips on how to do it responsibly.
articles.content:
If youre inspired by Lees story and want to give it a go, where do you start and how should you go about it?

articles.title: Vendors lament low turnout at first Hong Kong trade showcase after border reopens - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Participants from mainland China say turnout has dipped compared with pre-pandemic events, adding foreign clients called Asia trips ‘not cost-effective’.
